# `ConversationSchemaData` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| schema | [`ConversationSchemaReference`](conversationschemareference-definition.md) | Yes | Schema that defines attributes. |
| attributes | [`ConversationSchemaAttribute[]`](conversationschemaattribute-definition.md) | Yes | Attributes to use for filtering; number of elements: min: 1, max: 5. |
| operator | `string` | No | Operator to apply for multiple attributes, default: MatchAll |
